title: FSA Gradient Alloy i30 Wheels Are Ready to Drop In
content:
Looking for a new set of top-notch alloy wheels? 

With the Gradient Off-Road i30 alloy wheels, FSA adds an enduro and downhill-focused wheelset, expanding its Gradient line. The wheels come in both 27.5” and 29er, with an asymmetrical rim design.

Freehub compatibility includes SRAM XD, Shimano Micro Spline, and HG. Boost rear spacing is on board. They’re 23mm deep, with an inner width of 30mm and an outer width of 34mm.

Off-Road i30 buyers can specify between a 28- or 32-hole spoke bed. Of course, they’re tubeless compatible.

A pair of Gradient Off-Road i30 wheels weighs 2,290 grams, according to company specs. They’ll set you back €539 in Europe or $584 in the US.
